title: Harold the Dummy
description: As if having the name "Ermaline" isn't bad enough, Ermaline's mother is crazy about safety. She decides to build a dummy to put in the back seat of their car so it will look like they are traveling with a man. The ugly dummy causes even more teasing for poor Ermaline. But when the dummy foils a car thief, Ermaline might have to change her mind.
meta: berets, certified, customized, fanatic, humiliated, plodded, Roman nose, unconscious, whittled
Use the reading strategy of asking and answering questions to understand text
Analyze Character : Use the reading strategy of analyzing characters to understand text
Commas : Use commas to set off clauses and phrases
Suffixes : Use suffix -ment to make new words
